channel.title: Sleepy Dev's Blog
channel.description: Simple tutorials and posts about exciting tech!

item.title: A little about FizzBuzz
item.description: Hello, Welcome to the sleepy’s dev blog. This blog hopefully will become a resource for beginners to learn about programming and technology. So let’s start with something simple FizzBuzz. FizzBuzz is a very basic interview question used to filter out candidates who cannot code. The problem is simple, loop through...
